title: Ashes of Lanterns
author: Rowan Hale
short_summary: A wandering archivist uncovers a map of lost cities that leads her into a web of old magic and political intrigue.
full_summary: When an archivist named Mira finds a cryptic map stitched inside an abandoned ledger, she is pulled from the safety of her stacks into a dangerous quest across forgotten borderlands. Each lantern-lit ruin she visits reveals pieces of a vanished civilization and the reasons it was erased. As rival factions close in and old spells awaken, Mira must decide whether to restore the past or keep its secrets buried. A lyrical fantasy about memory, power, and the cost of curiosity.
